name: International Airlines Group
goal:
International Airlines Group is the parent company of British Airways, Iberia, Vueling and Aer Lingus.

IAG combines the leading airlines in the UK and Spain, enabling them to enhance their presence in the aviation market while retaining their individual brands and current operations.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Any EU Legislation affecting the operation of any of the operating companies of IAG.
